devdoc.author: Kaan Uzdogan

addReview(string,string,string,uint32,ui.details: Assumes the owner(author) of the review is the msg.sender

params.journalId: - Typically ISSN number of the journal
params.manuscriptId: - An identifier for the manuscript. This could be an internal id of a journal.
params.timestamp: - uint32 Unix timestamp when review is published

getReview(address,uint8).details: Returns the Review struct as an ordered key value object. e.g. {0: 'JOURNALID', 1: ....}

params.addr: - The address of the author that is being queried.
params.index: - Index of the review in the Review array of the author.

getReview(address,uint8).return: journalIdmanuscriptIdmanuscriptHashtimestamprecommendationverified - bool that is true if 2 or more accounts vouched the review.vouchers - the list of addresses that vouched this review.

hasVouched(address,uint8).details: Assumes the voucher is the msg.sender.

params.addr: - The address of the author that is being queried.
params.index: - Index of the review in the Review array of the author.

hasVouched(address,uint8).return: bool showing that Review is vouched by the msg.sender.

params.addr: - The address of the author that is being queried.
params.index: - Index of the review in the Review array of the author.

isVerified(address,uint256).return: bool showing if Review is verified.

vouch(address,uint8).details: Assumes the voucher is the msg.sender. Checks if the Review is already vouched by the same address.

params.addr: - The address of the author that is being queried.
params.index: - Index of the review in the Review array of the author.

devdoc.title: A smart contract for storing peer reviews

addReview(string,string,string,uint32,ui.notice: Public method to add a review.

getReview(address,uint8).notice: Returns the Review belonging to the paramater address on the parameter index.

hasVouched(address,uint8).notice: Function to check if the Review at the given address and index is vouched by msg.sender.

isVerified(address,uint256).notice: Function to check if the Review at the given address and index is verified. I.e. vouched by 2 or more accounts.

vouch(address,uint8).notice: Function to vouch a Review at the given address and index.
